CodeList.Name: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Self Questionnaire Test Code

Description.TranslatedText: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Self test code.

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Self - In the past 30 days, how much difficulty did you have in: Concentrating on doing something for ten minutes?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 36-item Version Self-administered - Concentrating for Ten Minutes

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Self - In the past 30 days, how much difficulty did you have in: Remembering to do important things?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 36-item Version Self-administered - Remembering to Do Important Things

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Self - In the past 30 days, how much difficulty did you have in: Analysing and finding solutions to problems in day-to-day life?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 36-item Version Self-administered - Finding Solutions to Problems

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Self - In the past 30 days, how much difficulty did you have in: Learning a new task, for example, learning how to get to a new place?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 36-item Version Self-administered - Learning a New Task

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Self - In the past 30 days, how much difficulty did you have in: Generally understanding what people say?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 36-item Version Self-administered - Understanding What People Say

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Self - In the past 30 days, how much difficulty did you have in: Starting and maintaining a conversation?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 36-item Version Self-administered - Starting or Maintaining Conversation

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Self - In the past 30 days, how much difficulty did you have in: Standing for long periods such as 30 minutes?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 36-item Version Self-administered - Standing for Long Periods

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Self - In the past 30 days, how much difficulty did you have in: Standing up from sitting down?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 36-item Version Self-administered - Standing Up From Sitting Down

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Self - In the past 30 days, how much difficulty did you have in: Moving around inside your home?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 36-item Version Self-administered - Moving Around Inside Your Home

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Self - In the past 30 days, how much difficulty did you have in: Getting out of your home?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 36-item Version Self-administered - Getting Out of Your Home

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Self - In the past 30 days, how much difficulty did you have in: Walking a long distance such as a kilometre [or equivalent]?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 36-item Version Self-administered - Walking a Long Distance

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Self - in the past 30 days, how much difficulty did you have in: Washing your whole body?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 36-item Version Self-administered - Washing Your Whole Body

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Self - In the past 30 days, how much difficulty did you have in: Getting dressed?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 36-item Version Self-administered - Getting Dressed

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Self - In the past 30 days, how much difficulty did you have in: Eating?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 36-item Version Self-administered - Eating

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: WD7-Staying by Yourself for a Few Days
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Self - In the past 30 days, how much difficulty did you have in: Staying by yourself for a few days?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 36-item Version Self-administered - Staying by Yourself for a Few Days

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: WD7-Dealing With People You Do Not Know
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Self - In the past 30 days, how much difficulty did you have in: Dealing with people you do not know?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 36-item Version Self-administered - Dealing With People You Do Not Know

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Self - In the past 30 days, how much difficulty did you have in: Maintaining a friendship?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 36-item Version Self-administered - Maintaining a Friendship

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: WD7-Get Along With People Close to You
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Self - In the past 30 days, how much difficulty did you have in: Getting along with people who are close to you?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 36-item Version Self-administered - Get Along With People Close to You

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Self - In the past 30 days, how much difficulty did you have in: Making new friends?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 36-item Version Self-administered - Making New Friends

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Self - In the past 30 days, how much difficulty did you have in: Sexual activities?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 36-item Version Self-administered - Sexual Activities

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Self - In the past 30 days, how much difficulty did you have in: Taking care of your household responsibilities?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 36-item Version Self-administered - Care of Household Responsibilities

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Self - In the past 30 days, how much difficulty did you have in: Doing most important household tasks well?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 36-item Version Self-administered - Doing Important Household Tasks

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Self - In the past 30 days, how much difficulty did you have in: Getting all the household work done that you needed to do?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 36-item Version Self-administered - Getting Household Work Done Needed

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Self - In the past 30 days, how much difficulty did you have in: Getting your household work done as quickly as needed?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 36-item Version Self-administered - Getting Household Work Done Quickly

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Self - Because of your health condition, in the past 30 days, how much difficulty did you have in: your day-to-day work/school?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 36-item Version Self-administered - Your Day-to-Day Work or School

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Self - Because of your health condition, in the past 30 days, how much difficulty did you have in: Doing your most important work/school tasks well?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 36-item Version Self-administered - Doing Important Work or School Tasks

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: WD7-Getting All Work Done You Need
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Self - Because of your health condition, in the past 30 days, how much difficulty did you have in: Getting all the work done that you need to do?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 36-item Version Self-administered - Getting All Work Done You Need

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: WD7-Getting Work Done Quickly as Needed
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Self - Because of your health condition, in the past 30 days, how much difficulty did you have in: Getting your work done as quickly as needed?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 36-item Version Self-administered - Getting Work Done Quickly as Needed

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Self - In the past 30 days: How much of a problem did you have in joining in community activities (for example, festivities, religious or other activities) in the same way as anyone else can?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 36-item Version Self-administered - Problem Joining Community Activities

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: WD7-Problem Because of Barriers in World
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Self - In the past 30 days: How much of a problem did you have because of barriers or hindrances in the world around you?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 36-item Version Self-administered - Problem Because of Barriers in World

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Self - In the past 30 days: How much of a problem did you have living with dignity because of the attitudes and actions of others?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 36-item Version Self-administered - Problem Living with Dignity

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: WD7-Time Spend on Your Health Condition
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Self - In the past 30 days: How much time did you spend on your health condition, or its consequences?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 36-item Version Self-administered - Time Spend on Your Health Condition

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Self - In the past 30 days: How much have you been emotionally affected by your health condition?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 36-item Version Self-administered - Emotionally Affected by Health

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Self - In the past 30 days: How much has your health been a drain on the financial resources of you or your family?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 36-item Version Self-administered - Drain on Financial Resources

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Self - In the past 30 days: How much of a problem did your family have because of your health problems?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 36-item Version Self-administered - Problem Did Your Family Have

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Self - In the past 30 days: How much of a problem did you have in doing things by yourself for relaxation or pleasure?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 36-item Version Self-administered - Problem Doing Things for Relaxation

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Self - Overall, in the past 30 days, how many days were these difficulties present?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 36-item Version Self-administered - How Many Days Difficulties Present

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: WD7-Days Unable to Carry Out Activities
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Self - In the past 30 days, for how many days were you totally unable to carry out your usual activities or work because of any health condition?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 36-item Version Self-administered - Days Unable to Carry Out Activities

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Self - In the past 30 days, not counting the days that you were totally unable, for how many days did you cut back or reduce your usual activities or work because of any health condition?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 36-item Version Self-administered - How Many Days Reduce Activities

CodeList.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Self Questionnaire Test Code
CodeList.nciodm:PreferredTerm: CDISC Questionnaire WHODAS 2.0 36-item Version Self-administered Test Code Terminology
